summary: This is an email chain from September 2019 regarding the preparation and service of a subpoena to UBS Bank USA for financial records related to Ghislaine Maxwell. The correspondence is between an Assistant United States Attorney and FBI personnel, including a Forensic Accountant and a Special Agent, in the Southern District of New York.

persons.name: Ghislaine Maxwell
persons.context: The document is a request to prepare a subpoena for UBS Bank USA regarding her financial records, specifically mentioning credit card products.

events.title: Request for Subpoena Preparation
events.description: An FBI email requests the preparation of a subpoena for UBS Bank USA regarding Ghislaine Maxwell's financial records, noting a previous subpoena was issued to UBS Financial Services.

events.title: Subpoena Attached and Sent
events.description: An Assistant United States Attorney confirms the subpoena is attached and thanks the recipient, indicating the subpoena is ready for service.

locations: 1 St. Andrew's Plaza, New York, NY 10007
keyFacts: A subpoena was being prepared for UBS Bank USA specifically for records related to Ghislaine Maxwell in September 2019.
The investigation sought financial records, with a note that certain products like credit cards were provided by UBS Bank USA, not UBS Financial Services which had previously been subpoenaed.
The correspondence involves the U.S. Attorney's Office for the Southern District of New York and the FBI's New York Field Office, indicating an active financial investigation into Maxwell.
The document references a Forensic Accountant and a Special Agent as points of contact for the subpoena results.
